sentences.english: The Observatory explained that the average wind speed in Victoria Harbour did not reach storm force level.
sentences.chinese: 天文台解释，是维港港内普遍风速未达烈风程度。

sentences.english: There's an observatory on Mt. Zijin.
sentences.chinese: 这南京紫金山上就有一座天文台。

sentences.english: English abbreviations HEAO , namely, high-energy observatory.
sentences.chinese: 英文缩写HEAO，即“高能天文台”。

sentences.english: The optical images are from the Kitt Peak National Observatory in Arizona.

sentences.english: Hubble left the Mount Wilson Observatory during World War Two.

sentences.english: These events will be held at the Greenbelt Public Observatory.

sentences.english: It has worked in concert with other observatories to provide a multihued view of the cosmos.
sentences.chinese: 它与其他天文台同心协力，为宇宙提供了彩色的视野。

sentences.english: Leverrier sent his information to the Urania Observatory in Berlin, Germany.

sentences.english: US astronomers face facility closures Report calls for cutbacks at key observatories.

sentences.english: HKO assessed Neoguri weakened into a tropical storm before making landfall on Guangdong.

sentences.english: This paper describes an integrating photometer built at Purple Mountain Observatory recently.

sentences.english: Officials from Greenwich Observatory have the clock checked twice a day.
